_header: It fell against the next night
_description: The Fox and the Goose — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Pax uobis quod the fox / ffor I am comyn to toowne’

BLRoy19Biv.First Lines:
It fell ageyns the next nyghtThe fox yede to with all hys
                    myghte…
BLRoy19Biv.Last Lines: …Many bonys they muste pikeWill they ley adowne
